We are licensed by the Financial Service: We are licensed by the Financial Services Agency (金融庁 Kin'yū-chō, FSA) is a Japanese government agency and an integrated financial regulator responsible for overseeing banking, securities and exchange, and insurance sectors in order to ensure the stability of the financial system of Japan. The agency operates with a Commissioner and reports to the Minister of State for Financial Services. It oversees the Securities and Exchange Surveillance Commission and the Certified Public Accountants and Auditing Oversight Board.

To send money to your dear ones you only: To send money to your dear ones you only need to place a request, then pay using one of the following methods:

1.title: Bank Transfer
1.content: You can also send money to {0} account at {1}. Please remark the transfer with the TRANSACTION ID.

2.title: Japan Post Bank Card money transfer service
2.content: Upon request, we will send you a "Japan Post Bank Money Transfer Card" which you can use to send money at the nearest post office or Japan Post Bank.

3.title: Japan Post Bank Account Transfer
3.content: Transfer money from your Yucho bank account with your yucho bank card to FSR HOLDINGS CO LTD's Yucho bank account.

4.title: Walk-In payment
4.content: Select a beneficiary to transfer funds to.
